title: Miso Butter Corn Recipe
directions: Remove kernels from corn, set aside.
Mash together butter and miso paste until fully incorporated.
Heat up medium pan over medium heat. Add corn kernels and miso butter.
Toss 3-5 minutes until miso butter is completely melted into the corn and the kernels are cooked through and bright yellow.
Stir in green onions and greens and toss until greens are wilted (1-2 more minutes)
Serve with soft boiled egg on top.
